subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Nick Scandone, a member of the United States Stailing Team, is anticipating the race of a lifetime in China at the end of the summer.
snippet: Nick Scandone, a member of the United States Stailing Team, is anticipating the race of a lifetime in China at the end of the summer.
